newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 7.05 pct at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 7.05 pct at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 3-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 7.05 percent, compared with 7.67 percent at the previous repo tender on December 23, the Bank said.
Demand totalled 9.598 trillion lire against the 10.5 trillion lire offer.
The average rate was 7.72 percent against 7.76 percent at the last repurchase pact for 9.0 trillion lire and 10 days.
The pact takes effect today and the securities are for resale on January 2. The Bank said it received 21 bids which were all met in full.
